title: EU finds important gaps in Chinese poultry checks, sets tight deadline for fixes
summary_full: Commissioner Olivér Várhelyi said that if the non-compliance persists beyond February, Brussels will have to take further measures
summary_public: Commissioner Olivér Várhelyi said that if the non-compliance persists beyond February, Brussels will have to take further measures

BE.label: positive
BE.evidence: Brussels will have to take further measures
